title: Clash Beta Reward?
body:
So me and my friends have won the clash beta brackets, but we didn't get the banner?
I thought that if u win the clash brackets, u get the banner, but I was only 400vp out of 500vp.
Does any1 know why did me and my team not get it?

replies.body: The VP you earn is also based on what tier you played in. If you were in a T4 or 5 team, even if you won your bracket you wouldn't have earned enough VP.
